kep.loader package¶

kep.loader.download¶

Download and unpack Word files from Rosstat web site.

kep.loader.word¶

make_csv(data_folder) dumps data from tables in Word document to csv file. Windows-only, requires MS Word installed.

kep.loader.word.win32_word_dispatch()¶
kep.loader.word.open_ms_word()¶

kep.loader.word.row_iter(table)¶
kep.loader.word.query_all_tables(path, func)¶

Queries data from all tables within doc file.

Parameters:
  • path – path to doc file.
  • func – name of the function used to get_parsed_tables the table
Yields:

list of lists (rows)
kep.loader.word.yield_continious_rows(path)¶

Yields rows of the table within doc file.

Parameters:path – path to doc file.
Yields:list of strings (row elements)
kep.loader.word.to_csv(gen, csv_path)¶

Accept iterable of rows and write in to csv_path

kep.loader.word.yield_rows_from_many_files(file_list)¶

Iterate by row over .doc files in file_list

kep.loader.word.dump_doc_files_to_csv(file_list, csv_path)¶

Write tables from .doc in file_list into one csv_path file.

kep.loader.word.make_file_list(folder)¶
kep.loader.word.folder_to_csv(folder, csv_filename)¶

Make single csv based on sevral .doc files in folder.
